subject: Re: [junit] junit question
msgSnippet: ... You ll have to tell us more. Show us the entire test, for example. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416
messageBody:
pompee_c wrote:

> Hi,
> I would appreciate if I could get some help on the following. I am
> getting the following error while running the Junit test:
> junit.framework.AssertionFailedError:No tests found <path>
>
> The Assert that I am using is for comparing the size of the files
> which is of type int.
>
> Assert.assertEquals("Found output file size is zero..", 0 , outSize);
>
> Any help will be really appreciated.

You'll have to tell us more. Show us the entire test, for example.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
